item.description:
The usual (or usually unusual) First Thursday at the Wadsworth Atheneum. You know the drill. Cocktail party at 5:00 pm to 8:00 pm. Entrance fee for the party is only $5.00. The movie is the

The Proposal

Sandra Bollack is the high priced executive who forces her assistant to marry her her to avoid being deported to Canada...

Released 2009.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs at the event, then downstairs in the lobby.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: First Thursday Movie - The Proposal
